name: Project Madness
description:
A little game created for competition called Ludum Dare Jam.

In this game you play as Ludum Dare participant, who must finish his project in time. But in the same time, he must take care of his needs (entertainment, hunger...), and also needs of his beloved people and pets around.

Finish the project in time, but don't forget about your responsibilities!

-------------------------------------

I recomend to play the game IN WINDOW.

-------------------------------------
